channel.title: Cant change my client name! HELP!
channel.description: guys i am tryn to change the name of my client. when i go into .gui i find my name. then i edited it to what i wanted it to be and then compiled. then when i opened my server.... the name was still the old 1?!?!?! help!!!!

item.title: Cant change my client name! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Pkz-Evolution Pkz-Evolution
item.description:
@Pkz-Evolution wrote:

Normally to change client name the follow thing you need to look for what the name you trying to change.

Client.java
GUI.java

Change the name compile it

One more thing don’t forget to change the source name as well this may can be the problem as well.
Put the source in your desktop then in the search bar put in the name you trying to change let it load
let it load up then open it then change the name compile it

Hope this helps you

Regards-
Pkz-Evolution

Read full topic

item.source: Cant change my client name! HELP!

item.title: Cant change my client name! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @killermoe33 killermoe33
item.description:
@killermoe33 wrote:

open client.java and gui.java and press, ctrl+f and search for the old server name, ex: Killerscape then replace all of the results with what you want not only one all of them for both files and then make sure you hit save and finally compile. Also to make sure open the folder containing the subfolders and files and use the search included with ur OS and search for the name and it will show you the files with those words in them and you can edit those file too. Also sometimes to change the clients name, open Jframe.java and search for name in there. Hope I helped.

Read full topic
